video:video.video:title: Build 2016 for Windows XAML-UWP Developers
video:video.video:description: What was announced at Build 2016? Tons. With so many enhancements and so many new features, Windows developers might feel like they missed a few. Here's a summary to help you wrap your head around the&#8230;
